meaningMnemonic: A <kanji>peoples</kanji> <kanji>tribe</kanji> (or tribe of peoples) is a group that all stick together. They are one single <vocabulary>ethnic group</vocabulary>. What's your 民族?
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word, which usually means on'yomi readings from the kanji. If you know the readings of your kanji you'll know how to read this as well.
